name: dashy
description: Dashy is a highly configurable self-hosted dashboard for organizing links, services, and status widgets. It supports themes, authentication, custom YAML config, and integrates seamlessly with homelab setups.
features: Highly Configurable: Customize every aspect with YAML config. Total control over layout.
Service Organization: Group and categorize links and services. Perfect homelab dashboard.
Status Widgets: Monitor service health at a glance. Real-time availability.
Theme Support: Choose from multiple themes or create your own. Beautiful customization.
Authentication: Secure access with built-in auth options. Protected dashboard.
Self-Hosted: Complete ownership of your dashboard. Privacy and independence.
